title: Live From Barry's Wedding....
itunes:title: Live From Barry's Wedding....
description: This week we are on the road in Goffstown, New Hampshire for Barry's Wedding. Broadcasting live from the La Flor Dominicana studios, we will sit down and meet the bride that was crazy enough to accept his proposal. We will sit down with the official sponsor of the wedding Hammer + Sickle Cigars & Vodka as well as meet the Best Man. Join us as we light up the Hammer + Sickle Trademark Natural and Maduro on the longest running cigar podcast on the internet, The Cigar Authority.
